I was wondering if there was every any discussion of releasing GAR on the X=
box 360? I recently stumbled upon some information regarding submitting gam=
es to the XNA creator community, which (if it passed peer review) could all=
ow it to be added to the Xbox marketplace. I think the controls would be we=
ll suited for an Xbox 360 controller (they could be a lot like Geometry war=
s), and it could help reach wider audiences (if that's at all desired). 

I=
 haven't a clue how hard it would be to port it to the Xbox, but was curiou=
s if you guys thought about it at all?

-Paul
